q: other unions backed it as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labor unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the`` courage'' of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision,'' he said. When you mandate that every American purchase health insurance whether they want it or need it or not, you mandate that every business provide health insurance, you send people to a government-run exchange, you pay for it with hundreds of billions of dollars in higher taxes and mandates and you throw in public funding of abortion against the wishes of the overwhelming majority of the American people, that's a government takeover of health care and the American people know it, Mike Pence said. NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said.`` He's been in tremendous agony.'' Allen Iverson spent 10 seasons in Philadelphia before bouncing through Denver and Detroit, ending up in Memphis last season.
